<<<<<<< HEAD
A briefe description of the whole worlde wherein are particularly described all the monarchies, empires, and kingdomes of the same, with their seuerall titles and situations thereunto adioyning. Abbot, George, 1562-1633.
[63] p.
Printed by T. Iudson, for Iohn Browne, and are to be sould at the signe of the Bible in Fleete-streete, At London : 1599.
Attributed to George Abbot by STC (2nd ed.). Signatures: A-H⁴. Imperfect: print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
=======
